name: Summon Derghodaemon
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Book of the Damned, Vol. 3 © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F (a handful of bug carapaces)
text: This spell functions like summon monster, except it summons a single derghodaemon.
text_zh: 本法术的效果和召唤怪物一样，除了本法术召唤的是一只异虫邪魔。
